statements: SELECT * FROM device_settings
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings
SELECT setting_name, setting_value, device_id FROM device_settings
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'brightness'
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE setting_value = 'on'
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'security';
SELECT MAX(setting_value) AS max_value FROM device_settings;
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%display%' AND setting_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM DeviceSettings
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value, updated_at FROM DeviceSettings ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT device_id, setting_value FROM DeviceSettings WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT * FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status = true ORDER BY last_checked DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value, updated_at FROM DeviceSettings WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM DeviceSettings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%brightness%'
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM DeviceSettings WHERE setting_value IN ('on', 'off')
SELECT device_id, MAX(updated_at) AS latest_updated FROM DeviceSettings GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM device_settings;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings;
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM device_settings ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_groups;
SELECT group_name FROM device_groups WHERE group_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM device_settings;
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM device_settings ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_groups WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM device_groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT ds.device_id, ds.setting_name, dg.group_name FROM device_settings ds JOIN device_assignments da ON ds.device_id = da.device_id JOIN device_groups dg ON da.group_id = dg.group_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM devices ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT id, name FROM devices WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND name LIKE '%iPad%';
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, manufacturer, config_settings FROM devices WHERE manufacturer <> 'Samsung';
SELECT d.name, c.name AS category_name FROM devices d JOIN device_categories dc ON d.id = dc.device_id JOIN categories c ON dc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT id, MAX(updated_at) AS latest_update FROM settings_history GROUP BY id ORDER BY latest_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY setting_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE setting_value = 'enabled';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM devices INNER JOIN logs ON devices.device_id = logs.device_id;
